DOC.brief_summary: serum levels Ca, P, PTH and vitamin D metabolites before and after treatment with isotretinoin for sever acne
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Roaccutane on Ca, P, PTH and Vitamin D Metabolites in the Treatment of Sever Acne
DOC.detailed_description: few studies has been done of serum levels Ca, P, PTH and vitamin D metabolites in patients receiving isotretinoin .In this study we measured serum levels Ca, P, PTH and vitamin D metabolites before and after treatment with isotretinoin for sever acne in 30 patients . the patients had no kown skeletal, endocrine ,renal and gastrointestinal disorders.
DOC.criteria: sever acne renal disorders gastrointestinal disorders skeletal disorders endocrine disorders drugs such as glucocorticoids , thiazide diuretics, mineral multivitamins, anti acids, tetracyclines
